item.title: By: Si & Fi
item.dc:creator: Si & Fi
item.description: <p>Matthew, damn Anglia Railways and their money-grabbing ways!! All is fantastic here in NY - yoday we went up the Empire State Building - it was an amazing view but incredibly cold! We've shopped til we dropped this pm in Maceys and are off to the theatre in an hour or so. Take care to you, Judith, Matt, Mum & Dad.</p>
item.content:encoded: Matthew, damn Anglia Railways and their money-grabbing ways!! All is fantastic here in NY – yoday we went up the Empire State Building – it was an amazing view but incredibly cold! We’ve shopped til we dropped this pm in Maceys and are off to the theatre in an hour or so. Take care to you, Judith, Matt, Mum & Dad.

item.title: By: Judith
item.dc:creator: Judith
item.description: <p>What a nightmare! you poor thing! rather you than me, no sounds like a real mare. Everyone seems to be on holiday accept me & matt. We're looking forward to seeing mum &dad glad your safe Si & Fi enjoy NY and matthew your photo's are fab, you put us to shame, it looks lovely where you are, you'll be missing a sunday roast again. Take care to all abroad and enjoying life and keep in touch</p>
item.content:encoded: What a nightmare! you poor thing! rather you than me, no sounds like a real mare. Everyone seems to be on holiday accept me & matt. We’re looking forward to seeing mum &dad glad your safe Si & Fi enjoy NY and matthew your photo’s are fab, you put us to shame, it looks lovely where you are, you’ll be missing a sunday roast again. Take care to all abroad and enjoying life and keep in touch
